Title: Krystal POS
Description:
Krystal POS

Point of Sale Software with Dynamics AX 2009 provider.
HomeWiki:
Point of sales application for Microsoft Dynamics AX (Axapta)

Language : C#

Frameworks : .Net 3.5, WCF, WPF, Composite Application Library(http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/), Entreprise Library (http://www.codeplex.com/entlib)

This application uses Foxit reader for PDF printing. Download from http://www.foxitsoftware.com/pdf/reader/



This project is not even in alpha state do not use yet.



French:

Logiciel point de vente pour Microsoft Dynamics AX.

Cette application utilise Foxit reader pour imprimer les documents PDF. Télécharger le sur le site http://www.foxitsoftware.com/pdf/reader/

Ce projet est dans un état pré-alpha donc ne pas l'utiliser encore.
TagList: WPF,WCF,PDF,Dynamics AX,POS,Enterprise Library,Prism,C#,X++,Business Connector,Point of Sale,Invoice,Packing Slip,Krystal POS,Axapta,
